short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick configure borders for DOM elements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows you to quickly create different borders for different DOM elements. If you turn on and off element borders when developing a web page, this extension will allow you to do so without changing the code.
